title: What if we had a melee AD fighter who wielded a double saber...
body:
and focused on critical damage rather than straight critical strike, like Tryndamere and Yasuo?

Passive: Base Critical Strike damage is 150%, gains double the benefit of any other Critical Damage increase (so IE would still bring him/her to 250%). Maybe something small on scoring a critical strike.

Q: something that can guarantee a critical strike somehow, such as on an enemy with less than some % of HP.

W: Something to help keep up

E: Something to amplify damage on a single target

R: Steroid for increased attack speed and move speed; passive increases critical chance by 10/15/20%

What do you guys think?
